about_the_game:
If you want Cine Tracer (original) and Cine Tracer 2, purchase Cine Tracer.

Cine Tracer 2 is a virtual filmmaking sandbox that allows filmmakers to visualize short films, commercials, and feature films. The game has a strong first person framework built from scratch in Unreal Engine 5 that takes advantage of new lighting technology like Lumen Global Illumination and Reflections. The system has also been designed to work well with both gamepad/controller and mouse and keyboard.

Included is a single camera dolly system, a small lighting library, and two locations. The first location is a Gas Station that uses the new Sun, Sky, and Clouds system. The second location is a Warehouse Stage with a pre built 3 wall White Cyc and pre designed lighting grid.

The virtual actors are made with MetaHumans 2.0 and offer a wide range of hair options. There is small selection of clothing and and actors poses.
detailed_description:
If you want Cine Tracer (original) and Cine Tracer 2, purchase Cine Tracer.

Cine Tracer 2 is a virtual filmmaking sandbox that allows filmmakers to visualize short films, commercials, and feature films. The game has a strong first person framework built from scratch in Unreal Engine 5 that takes advantage of new lighting technology like Lumen Global Illumination and Reflections. The system has also been designed to work well with both gamepad/controller and mouse and keyboard.

Included is a single camera dolly system, a small lighting library, and two locations. The first location is a Gas Station that uses the new Sun, Sky, and Clouds system. The second location is a Warehouse Stage with a pre built 3 wall White Cyc and pre designed lighting grid.

The virtual actors are made with MetaHumans 2.0 and offer a wide range of hair options. There is small selection of clothing and and actors poses.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Latest MacOS Monterey (MacOS 12)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 Hardware and newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 1.2 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Latest MacOS Monterey (MacOS 12)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M2 or newer hardware
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 1.2 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Cine Tracer 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Cine Tracer 2 is a cinematography visualization app used for pre-production for live action productions.
